entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
